name: Blessing Hospital
notes: Part of Blessing Health System (2 hospitals: Blessing Hospital and Illini Community Hospital). Largest hospital in the tri-state region of western IL, northeast MO, and southeast IA.

name: Mosaic Life Care at St. Joseph
notes: Part of Mosaic Life Care (3 hospitals across northwest MO). Serves 35 counties across northwest MO, northeast KS, southeast NE, and southwest IA.

name: Carle BroMenn Medical Center
notes: Part of Carle Health (8 hospitals across central and southeastern IL). Community hospital serving the Bloomington-Normal metropolitan area.

name: Adena Regional Medical Center
notes: Part of Adena Health System (4 hospitals in south central OH). Independent nonprofit serving a population of over 400,000 in southern Ohio.
